snippet.title: Arcade Game: Computer Othello (1978 Nintendo)
snippet.description:
A Video Game version of the classic board game. This game consists of 'squares' and 'plus'. You move the cursor by using vertical and horizontal buttons, not by using sticks. You then set the piece with another button. You can also skip your turn by pressing the pass button. If you wish to give up, you may press the Hantei button and the game is over. Or, you can also wait for the timer to hit zero and game is over. 

An early video game from Nintendo.

Note: Wow! the controls are confusing here. Had trouble setting the pieces here since I'm playing the 'Plus' side.
